variables.description: Version of typesense. See https://hub.docker.com/r/typesense/typesense/tags?page=1&ordering=last_updated for available versions.
variables.label: App Version

variables.description: Allow JavaScript client to access Typesense directly from the browser.
variables.label: Enable CORS

instructions.start: Install typesense and start using it.
instructions.end: Remember to make port 8108 accessible if you want to access the admin panel.

description: Typesense offers a delightful, out-of-the-box search experience. From instant search, to autosuggest, to faceted search, Typesense has got you covered.
